text: Virginia College was a private for-profit college. It was located primarily in the southeastern United States. It was founded in 1983. It offered classes, certificates, diplomas, and degrees related to specific professions such as health sciences, information technology, business, office management, and criminal justice. It also offered online degree programs. In December 2018 Virginia College announced all campuses would close citing financial challenges and accreditation issues. Category:Colleges and universities in Alabama Category:1983 establishments in the United States Category:2018 disestablishments in the United States Category:20th-century establishments in Virginia
title: Virginia College
